entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. 60 percent chance of snow over northern sections overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. 60 percent chance of snow over northern sections early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
